attributes.action: Close schools due to the outbreak of corona virus
attributes.additional_details: The government should close schools, universities and colleges because of the close bubbles that could be created. Corona virus cases could reach to 4,000 a day without the chance of it decreasing if education systems aren’t closed.
attributes.background:
The schools should be closed.
The outbreak will further increase and the risk will be increased!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
